mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_status ( prjt_no , buss_uncmpl_cnt , buss_cmpl_cnt , buss_exce_cnt , issu_solve_cnt , issu_unsolve_cnt , issu_unsolvable_cnt , buss_cmpl_rate , buss_uncmpl_rate , buss_exce_rate , issu_solve_rate , issu_unsolve_rate , issu_unsolvable_rate , prjt_stat_dt_cnt , prjt_memb_cnt ) SELECT #{prjtNo} , buss_uncmpl_cnt , buss_cmpl_cnt , buss_exce_cnt , issu_solve , issu_unsolve , issu_unsolvable , TRUNC(buss_uncmpl_cnt/buss_cnt*100,2) AS buss_cmpl_rate , TRUNC(buss_cmpl_cnt/buss_cnt*100,2) AS buss_uncmpl_rate , TRUNC(buss_exce_cnt/buss_cnt*100,2) AS buss_exce_rate , TRUNC(issu_solve/issu_cnt*100,2) AS issu_solve_rate , TRUNC(issu_unsolve/issu_cnt*100,2) AS issu_unsolve_rate , TRUNC(issu_unsolvable/issu_cnt*100,2) AS issu_unsolvable_rate , prjt_dt_cnt , prjt_memb_cnt FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM business WHERE prjt_no = #{prjtNo} AND buss_st IN ('0K1', '0K3')) AS buss_uncmpl_cnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM business WHERE prjt_no = #{prjtNo} AND buss_st = '0K2') AS buss_cmpl_cnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM business WHERE prjt_no = #{prjtNo} AND buss_st = '0K4') AS buss_exce_cnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM issue WHERE prjt_no = #{prjtNo} AND issu_st = '0E1' ) AS issu_solve, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM issue WHERE prjt_no = #{prjtNo} AND issu_st = '0E2' ) AS issu_unsolve, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM issue WHERE prjt_no = #{prjtNo} AND issu_st = '0E3' ) AS issu_unsolvable, ( SELECT prjt_cmpltdt - prjt_fdt FROM project WHERE prjt_no = #{prjtNo}) AS prjt_dt_cnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM project_member WHERE prjt_no = #{prjtNo}) AS prjt_memb_cnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM business WHERE prjt_no = #{prjtNo}) AS buss_cnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM issue WHERE prjt_no = #{prjtNo}) AS issu_cnt FROM dual ) st
